title: Filled with shimmering natural light, Historic Farmhouse*waterfront
description:
The two-bedroom Smokehouse apartment is one of two executive apartments that we offer at LilyField Farm, a 300-year-old historic farmstead featuring unique, furnished accommodations in a country setting. Short-term and long-term leases available. We breathe new life into vintage buildings by restoring them into beautiful living spaces -- for you.
This is ideal for executive relocation, corporate housing needs, internships, students, traveling nurses, health-care and other professionals, and term-contract employees, Short term and year-to-year options are available.
LilyField is a working Pennsylvania farmstead nestled on a hillside overlooking a lake. It's a tranquil place where blue herons glide just above the water, and turtles sunbathe to a chorus of bullfrogs. The pastures are animated by chickens, ducks, goats, and our two potbellied pigs stretched out under the apple trees for their afternoon nap amid a glory of over 250 varieties of daylilies and other blossoms.
-- Smokehouse includes utilities package: electric, wi-fi, water, sewer, heating, air conditioning, trash removal, and more.
-- Pets are welcome; monthly fee per pet.
-- First month's rent, last month's rent and security deposit.
-- Smokehouse will have a regular cleaning service for a monthly fee.
-- Please map location to be sure it is convenient for your work and lifestyle.
***We are located in the township of Worcester, about midway between Collegeville and Skippack.
-- Prices, amenities, and availability are subject to change without notice.
Take a look! You quickly will see why we love living at LilyField Farm - and why you might, too. Don't let this delightful opportunity slip away. We look forward to talking with you soon.

title: Offering Studio, 1 & 2 bedroom apartments. Center City Philadelphia Ap
description:
Offering Studio, 1 & 2 bedroom apartments. Center City Philadelphia Apartments Near Rittenhouse Square Be a part of history! ICON mixes the beauty of the past with the modern amenities of today. Included on theÃ‚Â National Register of Historic Places this incredible rental building soars to new heights, just like its iconic, ziggurat-topped peak. Looking for a downtown Philadelphia apartment nearÃ‚Â Rittenhouse Square? You've found it! ICON is the most exciting rental property to ever grace Rittenhouse Square. A quintessential example of the Art Deco exuberance that defined the 1920s and 30s, ICON's design is inspired by Art Deco's geometric shapes and today's streamlined lifestyle. With this historic luxury building, you can be within steps of all the fine dining, high-end retail and cultural offerings that Philadelphia has to offer. The most fashionable edifice of its day, ICON is as rich in history as it is in beauty. Opened in 1930, at the beginning of the Great Depression, the building's ground floor tenants included both Cunard's White Star Line and the United States Lines, and the esteemed Pew family maintained a pied-a-terre on the 25th Floor. Today, this history echoes throughout ICON, a building that is a rare architectural experience. The lobby is so stunning it will make you stop in your tracks, with its Art Deco-styled elevators, glazed black brick and grey porcelain flooring and a cast-bronze portal. And the residences feature the kind of classic fixtures, state-of-the-art appliances and iconic details that can only be found in a landmark building. Apartment amenities: Kitchen features include sleek high gloss white cabinets with soft close drawers and doors.Ã‚Â Stainless steel appliances, including a glass top electric range and microwave. Glass-tile, kitchen backsplash. Quartz top kitchen island. Engineered hardwood flooring. Baths with sleek, high gloss cabinets and quartz countertops, glazed 12x12 porcelain tile. Air conditioning. title: LOCATION, LOCATION, LOCATION! Feast your eyes on a gorgeous!
description:
Feast your eyes on a gorgeous, fully renovated 1867 Queen Anne Italianate carriage house situated on a quiet, well-maintained block in the heart of Fairmount! This home provides city living at its finest, includes a one car garage with extra storage and two private decks. Enter through a classic foyer with 2 stunning mahogany doors. The open floor plan boasts a well-appointed gourmet kitchen with stainless steel appliances, granite countertops, a walk-in pantry, and a large breakfast bar area. Completing the first floor of this home are the dining room, a spacious family room, a powder room, a laundry area, and the garage with original blue slate flooring. The second floor includes a spacious living area with gorgeous hardwood flooring and a wood-burning fireplace for those cozy fall and winter evenings and two well-appointed en-suite bedrooms, including one bathroom with radiant heated floors and waterfall shower head. The third floor features a sun-filled study with an oversized cupola, beautiful in-laid hardwood floors and French doors, which lead to a large deck area, complete with a pergola, gas connected grill and views of the Art Museum fireworks. The beautiful primary suite includes a spacious walk-in closet, an elegant full bath with heated limestone floors, double vanity, and waterfall shower head and French doors that lead to another private roof deck where you can take in the breathtaking city views! Additional highlights of this home include updated mechanicals - new HVAC and a new water heater, custom millwork, a new roof, and high-end finishes throughout while simultaneously maintaining the original charm and unique character of the home. Located on a desirable, tree-lined street in the heart of the Art Museum area, just steps to Fairmount Park and so many great restaurants and The Barnes. There are also so many indoor and outdoor entertainment options close by like Eastern State Penitentiary, The Met Philadelphia, Boathouse Row, Schuylkill River Trail and so much more. Does this sound like your new home? Schedule your showing today - This charmer will not last long!

title: Now available for rent! Located in the heart of Graduate Hospital
description:
Now available for rent! Located in the heart of Graduate Hospital, situated amongst the dining and community gathering spaces that make this neighborhood one of Philly's most desireable, is a gorgeous 3 story brick-front townhome. An open floor plan and wide layout greets you as you enter this sophisticated, light-filled open concept living/dining space. The space enjoys an abundance of natural light owing to two west facing windows. The contemporary style pairs neutral walls with rich dark hardwood floors, and cabinetry, and shows off a grand white Quartz island with a striking waterfall feature. If a glamorous kitchen is what you’re looking for, you will be pleased with the newly renovated custom chef’s kitchen which is designed with generous storage space, specialized knife, spice and kitchen-tool drawers as well as hidden panel built-in garbage and recycling storage. If creating a welcoming space for family and visitors is your goal, the oversized island seats 5 comfortably and is perfect for entertaining or for casual family meals in the kitchen. Stainless steel appliances include a counter depth, side-by-side refrigerator, a 5-burner gas range, range hood and a dishwasher designed to disappear behind a cabinet panel. The second level of the home features wainscoting in the hallway along with two bedrooms plus a shared 3-piece bathroom. Both bedrooms are spacious and feature hardwood floors and ample closets. The hall bath features a tub/shower combo, plus a modern vanity, matching mirror and ample storage closet. The third floor is the primary suite level with an open plan to include a den/home office, perfect for working from home, or also perfect to finish as a nursery for a growing family. This room is also finished with wainscoting for a unique look. The bedroom area features high ceilings, hardwood floors, two windows, a large french door style double closet and an additional single closet with built-in shelving/storage. The private primary bathroom has a bathtub along with a separate stall shower, vanity and a third storage closet. Need more living space or a bonus room? The fully finished lower level is the perfect bonus space which can be used as a family room, exercise room, or additional guest space. It also features a convenient powder room. The home also has a rear patio, perfect for a bistro table and BBQ grill. Add some planters and enjoy your private city garden. With a WalkScore of 96, this home is within a short stroll to amazing Graduate Hospital destinations. It's located blocks from Julian Abel park, Chester Arthur School and a short walk from the many neighborhood restaurants, bars, coffee shops, and grocery stores. Easy access to public transportation, South Street, nearby Rittenhouse Square, and the Schuylkill River Trail. Sorry, no pets. No smoking.
759 S 22nd St
